code: import actionType from"../Constants/index.js";export var fetchProducts=function fetchProducts(products){return{type:actionType.fetchProducts,payload:products};};export var filterProducts=function filterProducts(products){return{type:actionType.filterProducts,payload:products};};export var filteredProducts=function filteredProducts(){return{type:actionType.filteredProducts};};export var increase=function increase(){return{type:actionType.increase};};export var decrease=function decrease(){return{type:actionType.decrease};};export var addToCart=function addToCart(product,count){return{type:actionType.addToCart,payload:{product:product,count:count}};};export var removeFromCart=function removeFromCart(product){return{type:actionType.removeFromCart,payload:{product:product}};};export var showCart=function showCart(){return{type:actionType.showCart};};
